scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:test
scripts.build:test: babel tests --ignore tests/fixtures --out-dir build/tests && cp -R tests/fixtures build/tests/fixtures
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:build && npm run cleanup:dist
scripts.coverage: npm run pretest && istanbul cover _mocha -- build/tests -R spec
scripts.pretest: npm run cleanup:build && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.test:ci: npm run pretest && eslint --max-warnings 0 lib tests && npm run mocha
scripts.test:nolint: npm run pretest && npm run mocha
